Events.OnCreate:
(switch ; This mission only works in Rigel Aurelius (not (objHasAttribute aOwnerObj "battleArenaMaximus")) (msnDestroy gSource)
; Player must be ready to challenge The Slicer (!= (typGetData &stBattleArena; 'arenaRank) 'challenger) (msnDestroy gSource)
; Set up the mission (block ( (markerObj (objGetObjByID (objGetData aOwnerObj 'markerID))) (kateObj (sysFindObject markerObj "sNN:60; +kateMorgental;")) theShip ) (setq theShip (bamCreateGladiator aOwnerObj &scTheSlicerManticore;))
(msnSetData gSource 'opponentID (objGetID theShip)) (msnSetData gSource 'opponentSkill (objGetData theShip 'arenaSkill)) (msnSetData gSource 'repGain 500) (msnSetData gSource 'reward 5000)
; Make sure Kate is gone (if kateObj (block Nil (objSetPos kateObj (sysVectorPolarOffset markerObj 270 60)) (shpCancelOrders kateObj) (shpOrder kateObj 'gate) ) )
; Copy markerID (msnSetData gSource 'markerID (objGetData aOwnerObj 'markerID))
; No intro available (msnSetProperty gSource 'isIntroShown True) ) )
Events.OnCompleted: (block Nil (if (eq (msnGetData gSource 'destroyReason) 'shatter) (typSetData &msBattleArenaChallenger; 'shatteredSlicer True) ) (msnSetData gSource 'nextSoundTrack &muArenaChampion;) (typFireObjEvent &msBattleArenaFight; gSource 'OnCompleted) (switch (and (= aReason 'failure) (!= gData 'playerLeft)) (typSetData &stBattleArena; 'arenaRank 'loser) ) )
Events.OnReward:
(block Nil ; Add to reputation (typIncData &stBattleArena; 'arenaRep (msnGetData gSource 'repGain))
; Pay the player (rpgMissionRewardPayment (msnGetData gSource 'reward))
; Player is champion (typSetData &stBattleArena; 'arenaRank 'champion) )

Mr. Katami bows his head:
"I have nothing more to teach you. Remember everything I've said and fight with honor!"
The gladiators' quarters feels cold and empty without Mr. Katami. You prepare yourself as best you can to fight The Slicer.
Pandemonium greets you as you enter the gladiators' quarters. Friends and partiers are celebrating your victory. Mr. Katami hugs you like a long lost %son% and puts a drink in your hand.

"Too bad. The Slicer will retain his title. Well, at least you're still alive! That's something."
